content: garter stripes interrupted by bold slipped stitch columns form an interesting structure on the back of the hand the mitts were inspired by westknit s clockwork shawl and they not only make a nice match to the shawl but they also need only little yarn the mitts are knitted in the round with a thumb gusset sizes s m and l to fit hand circumference of approximately 15 17 75 20 5 cm 6 7 8 length as given in the pattern results in approximately 19 cm 7 5 adjustable gauge 28 sts / 58 row = 10 cm/4 measured over garter stitch lightly blocked yet unstretched the mittens are worked almost entirely in garter stitch which creates a rather stretchy fabric so if your hand size is between the sizes given usually the smaller size will be sufficient material fingering weight yarn with a yardage of about 400 m 440 yds per 100 g approximately 100 m 110 yds as main colour and 90 m 100 yds as contrast colour 2 5 mm / us size 1 5 dpns or circular needle s for your preferred way to knit in the round 3 stitch markers scrap yarn or stitch holder darning needle the english pattern is called timeline mitts _ english --------------------------------------------------- einfarbige ‚säulen aus abgehobenen maschen unterbrechen kraus rechts gestrickte streifen und bilden ein interessantes muster auf dem handrücken die fingerlosen handschuhe sind eine tolle ergänzung zu stephen wests clockwork shawl die deutsche anleitung heißt timeline mitts _ german -------------------------------------- please note the pattern was reworked in march 2019 to add more sizes and make the instructions clearer all projects and comments before this date refer to the previous pattern version which is no longer available
